title: Curious about Unfair Chromas?
body:
There's a few of us players who find the new Chromas awesome, and that's great! But what about champions who already had some Chromas, but like, only 3? The new chromas are coming in groups of 4-7. What about Champs like Fizz, Garen, Morg, Caitlyn, and etc. They only have 3 chromas to certain skins.

Is anyone out there just as curious about whether or not this is fair?

replies.body:
It's the same argument as skins, really; "Why does this champion deserve more skins when this champion hasn't had one in 2 years?"

There's absolutely nothing stopping Riot from making more in the future. The thing with the number of Chromas is, initially they were only sold in 3-packs. Now you buy them individually, which means you aren't meant to just get them all, you get specifically the ones you want. Because of that, Riot is perfectly capable of adding more.

Fair enough! Like I had originally posted, just curious whether those who had paid money for a chroma pack felt it unjustified with the new packs containing 8 and the others not. ;w;'
The prices per chroma are the same, the larger bundles cost proportionally more.
Cant really think of it as unfair, these same champs you talk about are also the only ones whose chromas could be bought for IP at a point.
